meanings.definition: Cause physical harm or damage to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Running too fast injures your legs.
meanings.sent2: Falling off a bike injures your arm.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle too many things at once injures your ability to focus.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring problems can injure relationships over time.
meanings.sent5: The sharp blade injures the delicate skin easily.

meanings.definition: Sustain physical harm or damage to oneself.
meanings.sent1: Not wearing a helmet injures your head in a fall.
meanings.sent2: Playing rough injures your body sometimes.
meanings.sent3: Eating too much candy injures your teeth slowly.
meanings.sent4: Lack of sleep can injure your overall health.
meanings.sent5: The athlete injures himself during the intense training session.
